posts.post_content:
Brother 1: "Hey brother, what's up?"
  
Brother 2: "Nothing much, looking good!"
  
Brother 3: "Wassup, what'd I miss?"
  
Brothers 1 & 2: "AWWW COME ON!"
  
\*Dies\*

Posted By: aznxknightz (7/26/2011 10:46:52 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A cheer for Wizards for creating an alternate artwork for this card.  
  
It's reasonable that they stopped printing alternate artworks from different artists for the same card in the same set. (See Fallen Empires' variations of [Icatian Infantry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Icatian Infantry) for example.)  
Aside from basic lands, a card should in general be ássociated with its artwork.  
But making an exception by creating a second artwork (from the same artist) with a distinct relation for a legend which is intended to exist twice was a great idea!
posts.html:
A cheer for Wizards for creating an alternate artwork for this card.

It's reasonable that they stopped printing alternate artworks from different artists for the same card in the same set. (See Fallen Empires' variations of Icatian Infantry for example.)
Aside from basic lands, a card should in general be ássociated with its artwork.
But making an exception by creating a second artwork (from the same artist) with a distinct relation for a legend which is intended to exist twice was a great idea!

posts.post_content:
You can end up with **Two Legendary Samurai with: Bushido1, 4/3, and Haste** who only cost 3 CMC each!   
Once, I had equipped one with [Konda's Banner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Konda's Banner) and the other with [Tenza, Godo's Maul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tenza, Godo's Maul). These bros hook it up!

posts.post_content: I think the design of Brothers Yamazaki is brilliant. It's really flavorful, the artwork is good and the cards are actually pretty good compared to their manacost once you've got both on the field.

posts.post_content:
Hey, its a legendary that would be a *good idea* to run x4.  
Only downside, unless you pull 2... this card is just a 2/1.. "3/2" for ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)  
In my opinion, should have been 2/2.. "3/3". Would have brought him out of ping & bear range without his brother.  
  
5 stars for being interesting, 3 stars for development and game play.   
Final rating 4 stars.
